title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2815.4 - Rural aging services program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2815.4 - Rural aging services program

State Regulations

Housing preservation and community renewal activities
which are or have been funded under the rural aging services program operated
jointly by the Division of the Office for the Aging shall not be subject to the
limitations on the amount of funds a company may receive annually or in the
aggregate under the rural preservation companies program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2815.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
